src: किनभने उनीहरुले एउटै खलका समस्याहरु बेहोरेका हुन्छन् ।
mt: Because they have wrapped up the problems of the same.
gpt_explanation: Score -2 because it substitutes “wrapped up” for बहोरेका (“suffered/experienced”), mangles “उ एउटै खलका समस्याहरु” into the awkward “problems of the same,” and thus completely obscures the original meaning.

src: System on Chip නැතහොත් SoC යනු කර්යයන් ගණනාවක් තනි පැකේජයකින් කරගතහැකි ලෙස එකලස් කරනලද ප්‍රොසෙසර වේ.
mt: System On Chip or soc is a number of documents that can be made with a single package of assembled processors.
gpt_explanation: Score: -2. The translation completely misrenders key terms—rendering “කර්යයන්” (functions/tasks) as “documents,” mangling “processors” into “assembled processors,” and turning an integrated processor package description into an incoherent statement about making documents—thus obscuring the intended meaning and rendering the text largely incomprehensible.

src: After a Federal counterattack recaptured Battery Powell, Van Dorn ordered a general retreat.
mt: Nach einem föderalen Gegenangriff rekapitulierte Van Dorn Battery Powell und befahl einen allgemeinen Rückzug.
gpt_explanation: The translation uses the wrong verb (“rekapitulierte” means “recapitulated,” not “recaptured”), misattributes the recapture to Van Dorn instead of the Federals, and mangles the subordinate clause structure, making the sentence semantically nonsensical.

src: विधेयकको मसौदा त्यस विषयबाट सम्बन्धित सरकारका मंत्रालयमा विधि मंत्रालयको सहायताबाट तैयार गरिन्छ।
mt: The Bill's majority is prepared with the help of a methodology in the government's matters relating to that subject.
gpt_explanation: Score: -2. The translation mangles all key terms, rendering “मसौदा” as “majority,” “विधि मन्त्रालय” as “methodology,” and distorting the structure so that the original sense—that a draft bill is prepared in the relevant government ministry with help from the law ministry—is entirely lost, making the result nonsensical.

src: राजनीतिक वृत्तमा उनको यो प्रवेश कालान्तरमा रुसको इतिहास बदल्ने घटना सावित भयो ।
mt: His involvement in political circles led to the events that replaced the history of Russia in the calais.
gpt_explanation: Score: -2 The translation renders “कालान्तरमा” nonsensically as “in the calais,” miscasts “वृत्तमा उनको प्रवेश” as mere “involvement in political circles” instead of “entry into the political arena,” and wrongly uses “replaced the history of Russia” instead of “proved to be an event that changed Russian history,” producing a sentence that is semantically garbled and largely incomprehensible.

src: He lavished extreme praise on the poet—and equally extreme censure.
mt: Er verschwendete extreme Lob auf den Dichter umweltund ebenso extreme Misstrauen.
gpt_explanation: Die Übersetzung ist unverständlich, weil „verschwendete Lob“ unidiomatisch ist, „umweltund“ ein sinnloses Fragment und „Misstrauen“ das englische „censure“ komplett verfälscht, wodurch die Aussage über übertriebene Kritik verloren geht.

src: පුද්ගලයින් තිදෙනෙකුට වඩා එකවර ත්‍යාගය පිරි නොනැමීමට ඇති දැඩි නීතියද මතබේධයන්ට තුඩු දෙන කාරණයක් වේ.
mt: The strict law to not offer the prize at once more than three individuals is a matter of opinion.
gpt_explanation: Score: -2. The translation mistranslates “ත්‍යාගය” as “prize” instead of “gift” or “donation,” misorders “at once” and “more than three individuals,” and renders “තුඩු දෙන” (“fostering” or “encouraging” disputes) as “a matter of opinion,” completely obscuring the original meaning that the strict rule against giving gifts to more than three people at once fuels discord.

src: The bovids show great variation in size and pelage colouration.
mt: 这些船体的大小和骨盆颜色有很大的差异.
gpt_explanation: The translation earns –2 because it completely misrenders “bovids” as “船体” (hulls) and “pelage colouration” as “骨盆颜色” (pelvic color), thus obliterating the source meaning and producing a nonsensical sentence.

src: In October 1971 another police vehicle detonated a mine outside Katima Mulilo, wounding four constables.
mt: Im Oktober 1971 zündete ein anderes Polizeifahrzeug eine Mine außerhalb von Katima Mulilo an und verwundete vier Konstallationen.
gpt_explanation: The translation merits a –2 score because it misrenders “constables” as the nonsensical “Konstallationen” and incorrectly uses “zündete … an” to imply the police vehicle intentionally ignited a mine, thereby distorting the meaning and producing an unnatural, confusing sentence.

src: उनले आफ्नो रानी पाटलिको लागि जादूबाट यस नगरको निर्माण गर्‍यो।
mt: He built this municipality from magic for his queen patlí.
gpt_explanation: The translation mistranslates नगर as “municipality” instead of “town” or “city,” uses the awkward “from magic” rather than “by magic,” and fails to capitalize or properly render the queen’s name (Patali), introducing major lexical and grammatical distortions that hinder the original meaning, so it merits a –1.

src: Hindi sent an uncover SHARK investigator to videotape the pigeon shoot.
mt: Hindi schickte einen Aufdeckung SHARK Ermittler auf Video die Taube schießen.
gpt_explanation: Die Übersetzung ist unverständlich und ungrammatisch, weil „uncover SHARK investigator“ wortwörtlich als „Aufdeckung SHARK Ermittler“ wiedergegeben wird statt etwa „ungedeckter SHARK-Ermittler“, „to videotape the pigeon shoot“ fragmentarisch mit „auf Video die Taube schießen“ übertragen wird statt mit dem korrekten deutschen Verbalkompositum „die Taubenschießerei filmen“ und die Satzstellung insgesamt weder den Regeln des Deutschen entspricht noch den Sinn des Originals wiedergibt.

src: बीजापुरका सुल्तान आदिलशाहले धेरै दुर्गहरुदेखि आफ्नो सेना हटाएर तिनलाई स्थानीय शासकुन् वा सामन्तहरुका हात सुँम्प् दिएको थियो ।
mt: The Sultan Adilshah of Bijapur removed his army from many disturbances and gave him a handful of local rulers or materials.
gpt_explanation: Score: -2. The translation completely misrenders key terms—दुर्गहरू (“forts”) becomes “disturbances,” सामन्तहरू (“feudal lords”) becomes “materials,” and सुम्पेको (“handed over”) is lost—resulting in a nonsensical “handful of local rulers or materials” that obscures the original meaning and prevents comprehension.

src: आमाको दूध शिशुको प्रतिरोधक क्षमता बढाउनमा पनि सहायक हुन्छ ।
mt: Mother's milk is also subsistent in increasing the resistance capacity of the mother.
gpt_explanation: The translation completely mistranslates the beneficiary (“mother” instead of “baby”), chooses an unnatural, wrong word (“subsistent”), and renders the sentence semantically incoherent, making it impossible to understand the original meaning.

src: Eisenhower asked for Graham while on his deathbed.
mt: 艾森豪威尔临死前向格雷厄姆求婚.
gpt_explanation: 这个译文将“asked for Graham”误译为“向格雷厄姆求婚”，完全颠倒了原意，不仅导致信息丢失，还产生了荒谬的含义，应予以最差评分-2。

src: यस काव्यको नयाँ नौलो विशेषता भनेको यसको चित्रात्मक प्रस्तुति हो ।
mt: The new noun feature of this category is its cognitive presentation.
gpt_explanation: The translation completely mistranslates key terms—“काव्य” becomes “category,” “नयाँ नौलो” is rendered as “new noun,” and “चित्रात्मक प्रस्तुति” is bizarrely turned into “cognitive presentation”—resulting in a sentence that bears no relation to the source and disrupts any possible comprehension.

src: He reemerged once again in 1994 at WrestleMania X as guest referee for the WWF World Heavyweight Championship match between Bret Hart and Yokozuna.
mt: 1994 年 ， 他再次在摔跤马尼亚 X 号比赛中成为世界自然基金会世界重量级锦标赛的客座裁判员。
gpt_explanation: The translation grotesquely misrenders “WWF” as “世界自然基金会” (World Wildlife Fund) instead of the wrestling federation, mangles “WrestleMania X” into an awkward “摔跤马尼亚 X 号比赛,” and thus fundamentally distorts the source, rendering it incomprehensible in context and warranting the lowest score.

src: Polonium's isotopes tend to decay with alpha or beta decay.
mt: 溴铵的同位素容易随着 α 或 β 的衰变而衰变.
gpt_explanation: Translation replaces “Polonium” with “溴铵,” a completely different chemical, thus misidentifying the subject and rendering the sentence meaningless; this fatal terminology error breaks comprehension entirely.

src: On the 5th, a northward drift ensued while well southeast of Okinawa.
mt: Am 5. folgte eine Norddrift, während weit südöstlich von Okinawa.
gpt_explanation: -1: Die Übersetzung wirkt hölzern und unvollständig, da „Norddrift“ im Deutschen unüblich ist und das notwendige Subjekt bzw. Hilfsverb („wir befanden uns“) fehlt, wodurch der Satz zwar verständlich, aber nicht flüssig oder idiomatisch ist.

src: As a reward for defeating the rebellion, his younger and older brothers became earls.
mt: 作为挫败叛乱的回报, 他的年长兄弟成了奴隶.
gpt_explanation: This translation completely misrenders key content: it omits “younger brothers,” mistranslates “earls” (伯爵) as “slaves” (奴隶), and thus reverses the reward’s nature, making it unintelligible and fundamentally wrong, so it deserves the lowest score.

src: त्यसैले सन् २००१ को नोभेम्बरमा राष्ट्रियसभाले मतदान गरेर चाभेजलाई विभिन्न ४९ सामाजिक तथा आर्थिक अभियान लागू गर्न अनुमति दियो ।
mt: So in November 2001, the National Assembly voted to allow chávez to apply for several 49 social and economic campaigns.
gpt_explanation: The translation mangles the key verb and noun—“apply for several 49 social and economic campaigns” is a mistranslation of “विभिन्न ४९…अभियान लागू गर्न,” which actually means “implement/launch 49 different social and economic programs,” not “apply for campaigns,” and the phrasing “several 49” is ungrammatical; the unnecessary “So” at the start and the lowercase, accent-styling of “chávez” further distract from the source’s meaning, so major errors hinder accurate comprehension (score –1).
